lines.gurmukhi: jYsy qau Ast DwqU fwrIAq nwau ibKY pwir prY qwih qaU vwr pwr soeI hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Tau Asat Dhaatoo Daareeat Naau Bikhai , Paari Parai Taahi Taoo Vaar Paar Soee Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: As a bundle of eight metals loaded in a boat will reach the other bank without any change in its form or colour during transit,

lines.gurmukhi: soeI Dwqu Agin mY hq hY Aink rUp qaU joeI soeI pY su Gwt Twt hoeI hY
lines.transliteration_english: Soee Dhaatu Agani Mai Hat Hai Anik Roopa , Taoo Joee Soee Pai Su Ghaat Tthaat Hoee Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: When these metals are put in fire, they melt and acquire the form of fire. It is then turned into beautiful ornaments of metal better looking than each individually.

lines.gurmukhi: soeI Dwqu pwris prs puin kMcn huie mol kY AmolwnUp rUp AvloeI hY
lines.transliteration_english: Soee Dhaatu Paarasi Paras Pouni Kanchan Hui , Mol Kai Amolaanoop Roop Avaloee Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: But when it comes in contact with philosopher-stone, it turns into gold. Beside becoming invaluable, it also becomes beautiful and attractive to look at.

lines.gurmukhi: prm pwrs gur pris pwrs hoq sMgiq huie swDsMg sqsMg poeI hY ]166]
lines.transliteration_english: Param Paaras Gur Parasi Paaras Hota , Sangati Hui Saadhasang Satasang Poee Hai ?166?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly in the company of God-oriented and holy men, one becomes holy. Meeting with True Guru, the Supreme of all philosopher-stones, one becomes like a philosopher-stone. (166)
